chefShortBio: Aziza Hussaini is a renowned Afghan chef with over 15 years of experience in cooking authentic Afghan cuisine. She is passionate about sharing her love for Afghan food with the world and has written several cookbooks on the subject.

chefRecipes.name: Kabuli Pulao
cookingMethod: 1. Rinse rice and soak in water for 30 minutes
2. Fry lamb in oil until brown.
3. Add onions and fry until caramelized.
4. Add carrots and raisins and cook for a few minutes.
5. Add water and bring to a boil.
6. Add rice and cook until tender.

chefRecipes.name: Ashak
cookingMethod: 1. Mix flour, salt, and water to make dough.
2. Roll out dough and cut into circles.
3. Mix scallions, leeks, cilantro, and salt.
4. Place filling on dough circles and fold into dumplings.
5. Boil dumplings until tender.
6. Serve with yogurt and garlic sauce.

chefRecipes.name: Mantu
cookingMethod: 1. Mix ground beef, onion, garlic, salt, and pepper.
2. Roll out dough and cut into squares.
3. Place filling on dough squares and fold into dumplings.
4. Boil dumplings until tender.
5. Serve with yogurt and garlic sauce.
